did.unittitle: United Office and Professional Workers of America Files

origination.label: Creator

did.abstract: Documents and papers of the United Office and Professional Workers of America.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of records of the United Office and Professional Workers of America, CIO. Included are materials from Lewis Merrill, President of the United office and Professional Workers of America. Includes the pamphlet "The Organization of a single establishment : an approach" by Lewis Merrill.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: United Office and Professional Workers of America Files #5698m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence, statements, and printed material.
